H0.text: In 2009, who was convicted of the murder of Lana Clarkson. O.J. Simpson

H1.text: In 2009, who was convicted of the murder of Lana Clarkson. Charles Manson

H2.text: In 2009, who was convicted of the murder of Lana Clarkson. Robert Blake

H3.text: In 2009, who was convicted of the murder of Lana Clarkson. Phil spectre

A4.text: In 2009, Harvey Philip Spector was convicted of the murder of Lana Clarkson and sentenced to 19 years to life in prison.

A5.text: The retrial of Spector for murder in the second degree began on October 20, 2008, and the jury returned a guilty verdict on April 13, 2009.
